title: One Piece Eps 343-345

title: One Piece Episode 343 Recap
author: [swim squad]
description: Detailed recap of Episode 343 covering the revelation of Gecko Moria as a Warlord, Absalom and Perona's preparations, and the discovery that Thriller Bark is a ship. Includes plot summary and character analysis.
